Przykładowa konfiguracja aplikacji:
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<config>
    <data>
        <datasource url="<db_url>" user="<db_user>" password="<db_password>" />
        <queries>
            <query name="user_select">SELECT * FROM user</query>
            <query name="user_update">UPDATE user SET extension = :extension, username = :username, balance = :balance WHERE id = :id</query>
            <query name="user_delete">DELETE FROM user WHERE id = :id</query>
            <query name="user_insert">INSERT INTO user(extension, username, balance) VALUES(:extension, :username, :balance)</query>
        </queries>
    </data>
    <parameters>
        <param name="authAdapter">PublicAdapter</param>
        <param name="cache">false</param>
    </parameters>
    <interface>
        <main-menu>
            <item id="users_group" text="{translator:MENU_USERS}" img="new.gif">
                <item id="users_grid" text="{translator:MENU_USERS_GRID}" img="new.gif" />
            </item>
        </main-menu>
    </interface>
    <windows>
        <window id="users_grid">
            <title>{translator:WINDOW_USERS_GRID}</title>
            <pos_x>100</pos_x>
            <content>
                <html>{model:grid(users_grid)}</html>
            </content>
        </window>
        <window id="user_edit">
            <title>{translator:WINDOW_USER_EDIT}</title>
            <pos_y>0</pos_y>
            <height>700</height>
            <content>
                <html>{model:form(user_edit_form)}</html>
            </content>
        </window>
    </windows>
    <models>
        <model>
            <name>users_grid</name>
            <sql>
                <select>user_select</select>
                <update>user_update</update>
                <delete>user_delete</delete>
                <id>id</id>
                <columns>extension,username,balance</columns>
            </sql>
            <js>
                <setHeader>{translator:USER_GRID_HEADERS}</setHeader>
                <setInitWidthsP>15,*,15</setInitWidthsP>
                <attachHeader>#text_filter,#text_filter,#text_filter</attachHeader>
            </js>
            <taskbar>
                <add>
                    <label>{translator:GRID_BUTTON_ADD}</label>
                    <window>user_edit</window>
                </add>
                <edit>
                    <label>{translator:GRID_BUTTON_EDIT}</label>
                    <window>user_edit</window>
                </edit>
                <delete>
                    <label>{translator:GRID_BUTTON_DELETE}</label>
                </delete>
                <separator />
                <refresh>
                    <label>{translator:GRID_BUTTON_REFRESH}</label>
                </refresh>
                <save>
                    <label>{translator:GRID_BUTTON_SAVE}</label>
                </save>
            </taskbar>
            <internationalization>
                <not_selected_warn>{translator:GRID_NOT_SELECTED_WARN}</not_selected_warn>
            </internationalization>
        </model>
        <model>
            <name>user_edit_form</name>
            <type>sql</type>
            <sql>
                <insert>user_insert</insert>
                <select>user_select</select>
                <update>user_update</update>
                <id>id</id>
                <columns>extension,username,balance</columns>
            </sql>
            <form>
                <input>
                    <type>text</type>
                    <bind>extension</bind>
                    <label>{translator:FORM_USER_LABEL_EXTENSION}</label>
                </input>
                <input>
                    <type>text</type>
                    <bind>username</bind>
                    <label>{translator:FORM_USER_LABEL_USERNAME}</label>
                </input>
                <input>
                    <type>text</type>
                    <bind>balance</bind>
                    <label>{translator:FORM_USER_LABEL_BALANCE}</label>
                </input>
                <input>
                    <type>submit</type>
                    <label>{translator:FORM_USER_LABEL_SUBMIT}</label>
                </input>
            </form>
        </model>
    </models>
</config>
}}}

W dowolnym miejscu pliku można użyć taga: {{{<include path="<path>" />}}}. Pozwala to na podział konfiguracji na osobne pliki według własnego uznania.
